rdf:Description.dct:title: DCAT-AP-DK v.2.0.2
rdf:Description.dct:description: The Danish DCAT Application profile for datasets and data catalogues (DCAT-AP-DK) is a specification based on DCAT and DCAT-AP for describing public sector datasets in Denmark.

dcat:Distribution.dct:title: DCAT-AP-DK v.2.0.2 SHACL shapes (RDF/XML)
dcat:Distribution.dct:description: This document specifies the constraints on properties and classes of DCAT-AP-DK expressed in SHACL (RDF/XML)

rdf:Description.sh:name: Catalog
Katalog
rdf:Description.sh:description: A catalogue or repository that hosts the Datasets being described.
En udvalgt og arrangeret samling af metadata om datasæt og datatjenester i et katalog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A curated collection of metadata about resources (e.g., datasets and data services in the context of a data catalog).
En udvalgt og arrangeret samling af metadata om ressourcer (fx. datasæt og datatjenester i kontekst af et datakatalog).

rdf:Description.sh:name: title
titel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name given to the Catalogue. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.
Denne egenskab giver det eller de ord der navngiver kataloget. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af titlen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.
Et navn givet til ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: description
beskrivelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a free-text account of the Catalogue. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
Denne egenskab giver en tekstbaseret beskrivelse af datakatalogets formål og indhold. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af beskrivelsen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An account of the resource.
En forklaring af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: dataset
har datasæt
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property links the Catalogue with a Dataset that is part of the Catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver et datasæt som er opført i kataloget
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of data that is listed in the catalog.
En samling af data som er opført i kataloget.

rdf:Description.sh:name: service
har datatjeneste
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a site or end-point that is listed in the catalog.
Denne egenskab angiver et websted eller endpoint som er opført i kataloget.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A site or endpoint that is listed in the catalog.
Et websted eller et endpoint som er opført i kataloget

rdf:Description.sh:name: publisher
udgiver
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Catalogue available.
Denne egenskab angiver den aktør (organisation) der er ansvarlig for at gøre kataloget tilgængeligt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making the resource available.
En entitet som er ansvarlig for at gøre ressourcen tilgængelig.

rdf:Description.sh:name: creator
skaber
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the entity primarily responsible for producing the catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver den aktør der primært er ansvarlig for katalogets skabelse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making the resource.
En entitet der er ansvarlig for ressourcens skabelse.

rdf:Description.sh:name: homepage
websted
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver en webside som fungerer som katalogets hjemmeside.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A homepage for some thing.
Et websted for noget.

rdf:Description.sh:name: release date
udgivelsesdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor kataloget først blev formelt udgivet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date of formal issuance of the resource.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen formelt blev udgivet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: update/modification date
seneste ændringsdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Catalogue was changed or modified.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor kataloget senest er blevet ændret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date on which the resource was changed.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen blev ændret.

rdf:Description.sh:name: themes
emneklassifikation
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a knowledge organization system used to classify the Catalogue's Datasets.
Denne egenskab angiver en emneklassifikation der anvendes til klassifikation af datasæt og datatjenester i kataloget.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A knowledge organization system (KOS) used to classify catalog's datasets and services.
Vidensorganiseringssystem (KOS) som anvendes til at klassificere datasæt i kataloget.

rdf:Description.sh:name: spatial/geographic
geografisk område
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a geographical area covered by the Catalogue.

Denne egenskab angiver et geografisk område som kataloget dækker. Afgræsningen kan enten udtrykkes ved udpegnings af geofrafisk område eller ved anvendelse af en af følgende klassifikationen: EU Vocabularies Continents Named Authority List, EU Vocabularies Countries Named Authority List, EU Vocabularies Places Named Authority List eller Geonames (Sidstnævnte bør kun anvendes såfremt lokationen ikke findes i et af de nævnte EU Authority Lists.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spatial characteristics of the resource.
Ressourcens geografiske karakteristika.

rdf:Description.sh:name: language
sprog
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Datasets in the Catalogue. This property can be repeated if the metadata is provided in multiple languages.

Denne egenskab angiver et sprog som er anvendt til tekstbaserede metadata om datasæt og datatjenester i kataloget. Egenskaben kan gentages for hver sprogvariant metadata forefindes på. Til angivelse af sprog skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: EU Vocabularies Languages Named Authority List, http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A language of the resource.
Ressourcens sprog.

rdf:Description.sh:name: license
licens
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the licence under which the Catalogue can be used or reused.
Denne egenskab angiver den licens kataloget kan anvendes eller genbruges under.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.
Et juridisk dokument der fastlægger de officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: rights
rettigheder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Catalogue.
Denne egenskab giver reference til et dokument der beskriver adgangsrettighederne forbundet med kataloget
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
Information om rettigheder forbundet med ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: catalog record
har katalogpost
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a Catalogue Record that is part of the Catalogue
Denne egenskab angiver en registrering af et enkelt datasæt eller en enkelt datatjeneste som er en del af kataloget
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A record describing the registration of a single dataset or data service that is part of the catalog.
En post der beskriver registreringen af et enkelt datasæt eller en datatjeneste som er opført i kataloget.

rdf:Description.sh:name: catalog
har delkatalog
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a catalog whose contents are of interest in the context of this catalog.
Denne egenskab angiver et katalog som udgør en del af det aktuelle katalog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A catalog whose contents are of interest in the context of this catalog.
Et katalog hvis indhold er relevant i forhold til det aktuelle katalog.

rdf:Description.sh:name: has part
har del
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a related Catalogue that is part of the described Catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver en katalogiseret ressource som er en del af det aktuelle katalog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource.
En relateret ressource der enten fysisk eller logisk er inkluderet i den beskrevne ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: is part of
er del af katalog
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a related Catalogue in which the described Catalogue is physically or logically included.
Denne egenskab angiver et relateret katalog som det aktuelle katalog fysisk eller logisk er en del af.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.
En relateret ressource som den beskrevne ressource fysisk eller logisk er inkluderet i.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Catalog Record
Katalogpost
rdf:Description.sh:description: A description of a Dataset’s entry in the Catalogue.
Post i et datakatalog der beskriver registreringen af et enkelt datasæt eller en enkelt datatjeneste.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A record in a data catalog, describing the registration of a single dataset or data service.
En post i et datakatalog der beskriver registreringen af et enkelt datasæt eller en datatjeneste.

rdf:Description.sh:name: primary topic
genstand for registrering
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property links the Catalogue Record to the Dataset, Data service or Catalog described in the record.
Denne egenskab angiver det datasæt, den datatjeneste eller det katalog som er genstand for registreringen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A document that this thing is the primary topic of.
Et dokument som har denne genstand som dets primære emne.

rdf:Description.sh:name: listing date
tilføjelsesdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the date on which the description of the Dataset was included in the Catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor beskrivelsen af datasættet eller datatjenesten blev registreret i kataloget.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date of formal issuance of the resource.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen formelt blev udgivet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: update/ modification date
seneste ændringsdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Catalogue entry was changed or modified.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor katalogposten senest er blevet ændret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date on which the resource was changed.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen blev ændret.

rdf:Description.sh:name: change type
status
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the type of the latest revision of a Dataset's entry in the Catalogue.

Denne egenskab angiver hvilken tilstand katalogposten befinder sig ift. udvikling og ibrugtagning. Til angivelse af status skal følgende klassifikation anvendes ADMS Status: http://purl.org/adms/status/ (Udfaldsrum: Completed, Deprecated, Under Development, Withdrawn)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links to the status of the Asset or Asset Distribution in the context of a particular workflow process. Since Status is defined using a skos:Concept, that is the defined range for this property.
Link til status for aktivets eller dets distribution set i forhold til et bestemt workflow.

rdf:Description.sh:name: title
titel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name given to the Catalogue Record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.
Denne egenskab angiver det eller de ord som navngiver katalogposten. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af titlen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.
Et navn givet til ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: description
beskrivelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a free-text account of the record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
Denne egenskab giver en tekstbaseret beskrivelse af katalogposten. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af beskrivelsen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An account of the resource.
En forklaring af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: application profile
overholder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to an Application Profile that the Dataset’s metadata conforms to
Denne egenskab angiver en specifikation (anvendelsesprofil) som datasættets metadata er i overensstemmmelse med.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.
En etableret standard som den beskrevne ressource er i overensstemelse med.

rdf:Description.sh:name: language
sprog
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Dataset. This property can be repeated if the metadata is provided in multiple languages.

Denne egenskab angiver et sprog som er anvendt til tekstbaserede metadata om datasæt og datatjenester i kataloget. Egenskaben kan gentages for hver sprogvariant metadata forefindes på. Til angivelse af sprog skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: EU Vocabularies Languages Named Authority List, http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A language of the resource.
Ressourcens sprog.

rdf:Description.sh:name: source metadata
kilde
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the original metadata that was used in creating metadata for the Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver de oprindelige metadata som blev anvendt til oprettelse af metadata om det aktuelle datasæt eller den aktuelle datatjeneste.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.
En relateret ressource som den beskrevne ressource er afledt af.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Dataset
Datasæt
rdf:Description.sh:description: A conceptual entity that represents the information published.
En samling af data, udgivet eller udvalgt og arrangeret af en enkelt kilde og som er til rådighed for adgang eller download i en eller flere repræsentationer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of data, published or curated by a single agent, and available for access or download in one or more representations.
En samling af data, udgivet eller udvalgt og arrangeret af en enkelt kilde og som er til rådighed for adgang eller download i en eller flere repræsentationer.

rdf:Description.sh:name: identifikator
identifier
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the main identifier for the Dataset, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalogue.
Denne egenskab angiver den primære identifikator for datasættet, for eksempel en URI eller anden identifikator i kontekst af kataloget.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.
En entydig reference til ressourcen i en givet kontekst.

rdf:Description.sh:name: anden identifikator
other identifier
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a secondary identifier of the Dataset, such as MAST/ADS[1], DataCite[2], DOI[3], EZID[4] or W3ID[5].
Denne egenskab angiver lokal identifikator for datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: adms:identifier is used to link any resource to an instance of adms:Identifier which is its range
adms:identifier anvendes til at forbinde enhver ressource til en instans af adms:Identifier, som udgør dens rækkevidde

rdf:Description.sh:name: title
titel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name given to the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.
Denne egenskab angiver det eller de ord som navngiver datasættet. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af titlen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.
Et navn givet til ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: description
beskrivelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a free-text account of the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
Denne egenskab giver en tekstbaseret beskrivelse af datasættets formål og indhold. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af beskrivelsen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An account of the resource.
En forklaring af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: publisher
udgiver
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the entity (organisation) responsible for making the Dataset available. Any dataset in a catalog must be linked to at least one agent, either a publisher or the dataset responsible organisation.

Denne egenskab angiver den aktør (organisation) som primært er ansvarlig for at gøre datasættet tilgængelig. Ethvert datasæt i et givet katalog skal være tilknyttet mindst én aktør, enten en udgiver eller en datasætanvarlig organisation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making the resource available.
En entitet som er ansvarlig for at gøre ressourcen tilgængelig.

rdf:Description.sh:name: dataset responsible organisation
datasætansvarlig organisation DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property specifies the organization that is legally accountable for the dataset. Any dataset in a catalog must be linked to at least one agent, either a publisher or the dataset responsible organisation.

Denne egenskab angiver den organisation der har det juridiske ansvar for datasættet. Ethvert datasæt i et givet katalog skal være tilknyttet mindst én aktør, enten en udgiver eller en datasætanvarlig organisation. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: organisation der har det juridiske ansvar for datasættet
organization that is legally accountable for the dataset

rdf:Description.sh:name: creator
skaber
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the entity primarily responsible for producing the dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver den aktør der er primært ansvarlig for datasættets skabelse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making the resource.
En entitet som er ansvarlig for ressourcens skabelse.

rdf:Description.sh:name: contributor
bidragsyder DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
Denne egenskab angiver en aktør der er har bidraget til datasættets skabelse. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
En entitet der er ansvarlig for bidrage til skabelsen af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: maintainer
vedligeholder DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the agent that manages contributions to, and/or publication of a dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver en aktør der administrerer bidrag til eller udgivelsen af et datasæt. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A maintainer of a Dataset, software package (SoftwareApplication), or other Project.
En vedligeholder af et datasæt, softwarepakke (Softwareapplikation), eller et andet projekt .

rdf:Description.sh:name: contact point
kontaktpunkt
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver kontaktoplysninger som kan anvendes til at indsende spørgsmål eller kommentarer om datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relevant contact information for the catalogued resource. Use of vCard is recommended.
Relevante kontaktoplysninger for den katalogiserede ressource. Anvendelse af vCard anbefales.

rdf:Description.sh:name: dataset distribution
har distribution
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property links the Dataset to an available Distribution.
Denne egenskab angiver en tilgængelig distribution af datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An available distribution of the dataset.
En tilgængelig repræsentation af datasættet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: sample
uddrag
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a sample distribution of the dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver et uddrag af en distribution af datasættet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links to a sample of an Asset (which is itself an Asset)
Link til et uddrag af aktivet (som også selv udgør et aktiv)

rdf:Description.sh:name: landing page
destinationsside
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a web page that provides access to the Dataset, its Distributions and/or additional information. It is intended to point to a landing page at the original data provider, not to a page on a site of a third party, such as an aggregator.

Denne egenskab angiver en webside som giver adgang til datasættet, dets distributioner og/eller yderligere information. Egenskaben bør pege på en webside hos den oprindelige dataudstiller - ikke en side eller et websted hos tredjepart, såsom en aggregator.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Web page that can be navigated to in a Web browser to gain access to the catalog, a dataset, its distributions and/or additional information.
En webside som der kan navigeres til i en webbrowser for at få adgang til kataloget, et datasæt, dets distributioner og/eller yderligere information

rdf:Description.sh:name: conforms to
overholder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to an implementing rule or other specification.
Denne egenskab angiver en specifikation som datasættet er i overensstemmmelse med.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.
En etableret standard som den beskrevne ressource er i overensstemelse med.

rdf:Description.sh:name: documentation
dokumentation
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a page or document about this Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver en webside eller et dokument som beskriver datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A page or document about this thing.
En side eller et dokument vedrørende denne entitet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: theme/ category
emne
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a category of the Dataset. A Dataset may be associated with multiple themes - potentially from different classifications. The use of the EU Dataset Themes is recommended, see http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/data-theme. Using FORM - the Danish Public Task Reference Model - (http://www.form-online.dk/) and KLE - a Municipal Task Reference Model - (http://www.kle-online.dk/) for thematic categorisation is optional, and it is suggested that KLE is used by municipalities and FORM by regional and govermental authorities.

Denne egenskab angiver et emne for datasættet. Et datasæt kan opmærkes med flere forskellige emner - eventuelt fra flere forskellige klassifikationer. Anvendelse af EUs klassifikation Dataset Theme er anbefalet, se http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/data-theme. Anvendelse af FORM (http://www.form-online.dk/) og KLE (http://www.kle-online.dk/) til opmærkning med forvaltningsopgave er valgfrit, og det foreslås, at KLE anvendes af kommunerne, og FORM af regioner og statslige administrative enheder.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A main category of the resource. A resource can have multiple themes.
Et centralt emne for ressourcen. En ressource kan have flere centrale emner.

rdf:Description.sh:name: type
type
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the type of the Dataset. A controlled vocabulary for the values has not been established.

Denne egenskab angiver datasættets type i forhold til dets genre eller iboende karakter. Der er ift. DCAT-AP endnu ikke fastlagt et kontrolleret udfaldsrum for denne egenskab, men DCAT anbefaler at man BØR genbruge udbredte og anerkendte kontrollerede udfaldsrum såsom fx DCMI Type vocabulary eller ISO-19115-1 scope codes (se: https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat-2/#Property:resource_type)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nature or genre of the resource.
Type set i forhold til ressourcens genre eller iboende karakter.

rdf:Description.sh:name: keyword/ tag
nøgleord
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a keyword or tag describing the Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver et nøgleord eller tag der beskriver datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A keyword or tag describing the resource.
Et nøgleord eller tag til beskrivelse af en ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: language
sprog
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a language of the Dataset. This property can be repeated if there are multiple languages in the Dataset. When specifying a language, use the following classification: EU Vocabularies Languages Named Authority List, http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language

Denne egenskab angiver det sprog der er anvendt i datasættet. Egenskaben kan gentages for hver sprogvariant. Til angivelse af sprog skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: EU Vocabularies Languages Named Authority List, http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A language of the resource.
Ressourcens sprog.

rdf:Description.sh:name: access rights
adgangsrettigheder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to information about who has rights to access the dataset. A controlled vocabulary with three members (:public, :restricted, :non-public) has been created by the Publications Office of the EU. See EU Vocabularies Access Right Named Authority List: http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/access-right

Denne egenskab angiver oplysninger hvem der har rettighed til at tilgå datasættet. Via en klassifikation kan det angives hvorvidt datasættet er åbent, har adgangsbegrænsninger eller om det ikke er tilgængeligt. (Udfaldsrum: PUBLIC, RESTRICTED, NON_PUBLIC)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about who access the resource or an indication of its security status.
Information om hvem kan tilgå ressourcen eller en indikation af ressourcens sikkerhedsstatus.

rdf:Description.sh:name: spatial/ geographical coverage
geografisk område
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a geographic region that is covered by the dataset. The spatial scope can be expressed by geographical coordinates or by using one of the following classifications: EU Vocabularies Continents Named Authority List, EU Vocabularies Countries Named Authority List, EU Vocabularies Places Named Authority List or Geonames. (Geonames should only be used if a particular location is not in one of the mentioned Named Authority Lists.

Denne egenskab angiver et geografisk område som datasættet dækker. Afgræsningen kan enten udtrykkes ved geografiske koordinater eller ved anvendelse af en af følgende klassifikationen: EU Vocabularies Continents Named Authority List, EU Vocabularies Countries Named Authority List, EU Vocabularies Places Named Authority List eller Geonames (Sidstnævnte bør kun anvendes såfremt lokationen ikke findes i et af de nævnte EU Authority Lists.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Spatial characteristics of the resource.
Ressourcens geografiske karaktetistika.

rdf:Description.sh:name: spatial resolution in meters
geografisk opløsning (i meter)
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters. The ability of to detect details in an raster image or grid is referred to as spatial resolution. The spatial resolution is stated in metres. The more pixels are included in a raster image of a certain area, the higher the spatial resolution meaning the more details can be observed.

Denne egenskab angiver mindste geografiske afstand som kan resolveres i et datasæt, målt i meter. Muligheden for at registrere detaljer i et rasterbillede eller grid kaldes geografisk opløsning. Den geografiske opløsning er angivet i meter. Jo flere pixels der er inkluderet i et rasterbillede af et bestemt område, jo højere er den geografiske opløsning, hvilket betyder, jo flere detaljer kan observeres.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in metres.
mindste geografiske afstand som kan erkendes i et datasæt, målt i meter.

rdf:Description.sh:name: temporal coverage
dækningsperiode
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a temporal period that the Dataset covers.
Denne egenskab angiver den periode datasættet dækker
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Temporal characteristics of the resource.
Ressourcens tidslige karakteristika.

rdf:Description.sh:name: temporal resolution
tidslig opløsning
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset. Alternative temporal resolutions might be provided in different dataset distributions. If the dataset is a time-series this should correspond to the spacing of items in the series. For other kinds of dataset, this property will usually indicate the smallest time difference between items in the dataset.

Denne egenskab angiver mindste tidsperiode der kan resolveres i datasættet. Alternative tidslige opløsninger kan leveres som forskellige datasætdistributioner. Hvis datasættet er en tidsserie, så bør denne egenskab svare til afstanden mellem elementerne i tidsserien. For andre typer af datasæt indikerer denne egenskab den mindste tidsforskel mellem elementer i datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: minimum time period resolvable in a dataset.
mindste tidsperiode der kan resolveres i datasættet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: frequency
opdateringsfrekvens
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the frequency at which the Dataset is updated. For specifying frequency use the following classification: EU Authority Table Frequency http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency

Denne egenskab angiver med hvilken frekvens datasættet opdateres. Til angivelse af frekvens skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: EU Authority Table Frequency http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A rate at which something recurs.
Hyppighed med hvilken noget gentages.

rdf:Description.sh:name: release date
udgivelsesdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor datasættet først blev formelt udgivet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date of formal issuance of the resource.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen formelt blev udgivet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: update/ modification date
seneste ændringsdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor datasættet senest er blevet ændret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date on which the resource was changed.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen blev ændret.

rdf:Description.sh:name: has quality metadata
har kvalitetsmetadata DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a grouping of quality information such as certificates, policies, measurements and annotations as a named graph.

Denne egenskab angiver en gruppering af kvalitetsinformation så som certifikater, politikker, målinger og annotationer som en navngiven graf (dansk tilføjelse). Se Fælles sprog for datakvalitet: https://arkitektur.digst.dk/node/625
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refers to a grouping of quality information such as certificates, policies, measurements and annotations as a named graph. Quality information represented in such a grouping can pertain to any kind of resource (e.g., a dataset, a linkset, a graph, a set of triples). However, in the DQV context, this property is generally expected to be used in statements in which subjects are instances of dcat:Dataset or dcat:Distribution.

Refererer til en gruppering af kvalitetsinformation så som certifikater, politikker, målinger og annotationer som en navngiven graf. Kvalitetsinformation repræsenteret i en sådan gruppering kan vedrøre enhver ressourcetype (fx. et datasæt, en linksamling, en graf, et mængde af tripler). I kontekst af DQV forventes denne egenskab dog at blive anvendt i udsagn hvor subjektet er instanser af dcat:Dataste eller dcat:Distribution.

rdf:Description.sh:name: has usage
har anvendelse DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to dataset or distribution usage guidance/instructions.
Denne egenskab angiver instruktioner eller vejledning til anvendelse af datasættet. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Dataset or distribution usage guidance/instructions.
Instruktioner eller vejledning til anvendelse af datasættet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: payment imposed
betalingspålagt DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property specifies whether payment is imposed on the dataset or not.
Denne egenskab angiver hvorvidt datasættet er betalingspålagt eller ej. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: specification of whether payment is imposed on the catalogued resource or not.
angivelse af hvorvidt datasættet er betalingspålagt eller ej.

rdf:Description.sh:name: personal data category
personoplysningskategori DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property specifies a relation to specific personal data category
Denne egenskab angiver en relation til en bestemt personoplysningskategori. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: specification of a relation to specific personal data category
angivelse af en relation til en bestemt personoplysningskategori

rdf:Description.sh:name: confidentiality type
fortrolighedsgrad DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property specifies the extent by which information contained in a dataset can be disclosed.
Denne egenskab angiver i hvilket omfang information indeholdt i et datasæt kan videregives. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: specification of the extent by which information contained in the resource can be disclosed.
angivelse af i hvilket omfang information indeholdt i et datasæt kan videregives.

rdf:Description.sh:name: has legal resource
hjemmel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property specifies the legal framework for the dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver med hvilken hjemmel datasættet blev skabt. (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: It indicates the Legal Resource (e.g. legislation) to which the Public Service (red:resource) relates, operates or has its legal basis
reference til retskilde som danner grundlag for ressourcen

rdf:Description.sh:name: version
versionsnummer
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a version number or other version designation of the Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver en versionsnummer eller anden versionsangivelse af datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The annotation property that provides version information for an ontology or another OWL construct.
Annotationsegenskab som angiver versioninformation for en ontologi eller et andet OWL-element.

rdf:Description.sh:name: version notes
versionsnoter
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the version notes.
Denne egenskab angiver en beskrivelse af forskellene mellem den aktuelle version og forrige version af datasættet. Denne egenskab kan gentages for hver sprogvariant af versionsnoterne.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A description of changes between this version and the previous version of the Asset
En beskrivelse af ændringer indført mellem denne version og forrige version af aktivet

rdf:Description.sh:name: has version
har version
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a related Dataset that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver et relateret datasæt som er en version, udgave eller bearbejdelse af et aktuelle datasæt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.
En relateret ressource som er en version, udgave eller tilpasning af den beskrevne ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: is version of
er version af
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a related Dataset of which the described Dataset is a version, edition, or adaptation.
Denne egenskab angiver et relateret datasæt som det aktuelle datasæt er en version, udgave eller bearbejdelse af.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.
En relateret ressource som den beskrevne ressource er en version, udgave eller tilpasning af.

rdf:Description.sh:name: provenance
proveniensudsagn
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a statement about the lineage of a dataset in the form of statements about any agent changes significant for the authenticity, integrity, and interpretation of the dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver udsagn omkring datasættets proveniens i form af udsagn om eventuelle aktørskift som er centrale for autenciteten, integriteten og fortolkningen af datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.
Udsagn omkring datasættets proveniens i form af udsagn om eventuelle aktørskift som er centrale for autenciteten, integriteten og fortolkningen af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: related resource
relateret ressource
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a related resource.
Denne egenskab angiver en relateret ressource
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource.
En relateret ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: source dataset
kildedatasæt
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a related Dataset from which the described Dataset is derived.
Denne egenskab angiver et relateret datasæt hvoraf de aktuelle datasæt er afledt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.
En relateret ressource som den beskrevne ressource er afledt af.

rdf:Description.sh:name: is referenced by
refereres af
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property provides a link to a description of a relationship with another resource.
Denne egenskab angiver en reference til en beskrivelse af en relation til en anden ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described resource.
En relateret ressource som refererer, citerer eller på anden måde peger på den beskrevne ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: qualified attribution
kvalificeret kreditering
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property ascribes an agent some form of responsibility for the dataset.
Denne egenskab tilskriver en aktør et bestemt ansvar i forbindelse med datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Attribution is the ascribing of an entity to an agent. When an entity e is attributed to agent ag, entity e was generated by some unspecified activity that in turn was associated to agent ag. Thus, this relation is useful when the activity is not known, or irrelevant.
Kreditering er handlingen hvormed en en aktør anerkendes et ansvar for en entitet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: qualified relation
kvalificeret relation
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property is about a related resource, such as a publication, that references, cites, or otherwise points to the dataset.

Denne egenskab angiver en nærmere klassificeret relation til en anden ressource såsom en publikation der referer, citerer eller på anden på peger på datasættet. Anvendes til at referere til en anden ressource hvor relationens betydning er kendt men ikke matcher en af de standardiserede egenskaber fra Dublin Core eller PROV-O.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Link to a description of a relationship with another resource.
Reference til en beskrivelse af en relation til en anden ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: was generated by
blev dannet ved
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to an activity that generated, or provides the business context for, the creation of the dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver den aktivitet der dannede eller leverede forretningskonteksten for datasættets skabelse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Reference to an activity that made the entity available for usage.
Reference til aktivitet der tilvejebragte entiteten.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Distribution
Distribution
rdf:Description.sh:description: A physical embodiment of the Dataset in a particular format.

En specifik repræsentation af datasættet. Et datasæt kan være tilgængelig i mange serialiseringer der kan variere på forskellige vis. Alle distributioner af et givet datasæt indeholder de samme data. Forskelle mellem distributioner skal alene være betinget i distributionens anvendelse af sprog, medietype eller format, systemorganisering, tidslig- og geografisk opløsning, detaljeringsniveau eller profiler (der kan specificere en eller flere af ovenstående).
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A specific representation of a dataset. A dataset might be available in multiple serializations that may differ in various ways, including natural language, media-type or format, schematic organization, temporal and spatial resolution, level of detail or profiles (which might specify

En specifik repræsentation af et datasæt. Et datasæt kan være tilgængelig i mange serialiseringer der kan variere på forskellige vis, herunder sprog, medietype eller format, systemorganisering, tidslig- og geografisk opløsning, detaljeringsniveau eller profiler (der kan specificere en eller flere af ovenstående).

rdf:Description.sh:name: access address
adgangsadresse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset.
Denne egenskab angiver en URL som giver adgang til en distribution af datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URL of a resource that gives access to a distribution of the dataset. E.g. landing page, feed, SPARQL endpoint. Use for all cases except a simple download link, in which case downloadURL is preferred.

En URL for en ressource som giver adgang til en distribution af datasættet. Fx, destinationsside, feed, SPARQL-endpoint. Anvendes i alle sammenhænge undtagen til angivelse af et simpelt download link hvor anvendelse af egenskaben download-URL foretrækkes.

rdf:Description.sh:name: download URL
download-URL
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a URL that is a direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.
Denne egenskab angiver en URL der er et direkte link til en fil der kan downloades i et bestemt format.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The URL of the downloadable file in a given format. E.g. CSV file or RDF file. The format is indicated by the distribution's dct:format and/or dcat:mediaType.
URL til fil der kan downloades i et bestemt format. Fx en CSV-fil eller en RDF-fil. Formatet for distributionen angives ved hjælp af egenskaberne dct:format og/eller dcat:mediaType.

rdf:Description.sh:name: access service
adgangstjeneste
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset
Denne egenskab angiver en datatjeneste som giver adgang til en distribution af datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A site or end-point that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.
Et websted eller endpoint der giver adgang til en distribution af datasættet

rdf:Description.sh:name: title
titel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name given to the Distribution. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
Denne egenskab angiver det eller de ord som navngiver distributionen. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af titlen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.
Et navn givet til ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: description
beskrivelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a free-text account of the Distribution. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
Denne egenskab giver en tekstbaseret beskrivelse af distributionen. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af beskrivelsen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An account of the resource.
En forklaring af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: linked schemas
overholder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to an established schema to which the described Distribution conforms.
Denne egenskab angiver en specifikation (schema) som distributionen er i overensstemmmelse med.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.
En etableret standard som den beskrevne ressource er i overensstemelse med.

rdf:Description.sh:name: release date
udgivelsesdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Distribution.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor distributionen først blev formelt udgivet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date of formal issuance of the resource.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen formelt blev udgivet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: update/ modification date
seneste ændringsdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Distribution was changed or modified.
Denne egenskab angiver den dato hvor distributionen senest er blevet ændret.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date on which the resource was changed.
Dato for hvornår ressourcen blev ændret.

rdf:Description.sh:name: status
status
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the maturity of the Distribution. It MUST take one of the values Completed, Deprecated, Under Development, Withdrawn.

Denne egenskab angiver hvilken tilstand distributionen befinder sig ift. udvikling og ibrugtagning. Til angivelse af status skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: ADMS Status, http://purl.org/adms/status/ (Udfaldsrum: Completed, Deprecated, Under Development, Withdrawn)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links to the status of the Asset or Asset Distribution in the context of a particular workflow process. Since Status is defined using a skos:Concept, that is the defined range for this property.
Relation til den status et aktiv eller et aktivs distribution har i et bestemt workflow.

rdf:Description.sh:name: availability
tilgængelighestype
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property indicates how long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.

Denne egenskab indikerer hvor længe det er planlagt at distributionen af datasættet skal være tilgængelig. Til angivelse af tilgængelighedstype skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: Distribution Availability Vocabulary, http://data.europa.eu/r5r/availability/
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property indicates how long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.
Angivelse af hvor længe det er planlagt at distributionen af datasættet skal være tilgængelig.

rdf:Description.sh:name: language
sprog
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a language used in the Distribution. This property can be repeated if the metadata is provided in multiple languages.

Denne egenskab angiver et sprog som er anvendt i distributionen. Egenskaben kan gentages for hver sprogvariant metadata forefindes på. Til angivelse af sprog skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: EU Vocabularies Languages Named Authority List, http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A language of the resource.
Ressourcens sprog.

rdf:Description.sh:name: checksum
checksum
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property provides a mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed. The checksum is related to the downloadURL
Denne egenskab angiver en værdi som gør det muligt at verificere at indholdet af en distribution ikke er blevet ændret. Checksum-værdien er relateret til download-url.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The checksum property provides a mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a File or Package have not changed.
Checksum-egenskaben gør det muligt at verificere at indholdet af en fil eller pakke ikke er blevet ændret.

rdf:Description.sh:name: byte size
bytestørrelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the size of a Distribution in bytes.
Denne egenskab angiver størrelsen af en distribution angivet i bytes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The size of a distribution in bytes.
Størrelsen af en distribution angivet i bytes.

rdf:Description.sh:name: media type
medietype
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the media type of the Distribution as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
Denne egenskab angiver medietypen for distributionen som den er defineret af Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) (https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA.
Medietypen for distributionen som den er defineret af IANA.

rdf:Description.sh:name: format
format
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the file format of the Distribution
Denne egenskab angiver filformatet for distributionen som den er defineret af 'EU Vocabularies File Type Named Authority List' (http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.
Ressourcens filformat, fysiske medium eller dimensioner.

rdf:Description.sh:name: compression format
kompressionsformat
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.

Denne egenskab angiver filformatet for den distribution hvori data er indholdt i et komprimeret format, fx. med det formål at reducere størrelsen af downloadfilen. Formatet BØR udtrykkes med en medietype defineret af Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) (https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The compression format of the distribution in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file.
Kompressionsformatet for distributionen som indeholder data i et komprimeret format, fx. for at reducere størrelsen af downloadfilen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: packaging format
pakkeformat
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.

Denne egenskab angiver filformatet for den distribution som grupperer en eller flere datafiler, fx. med det formål at gøre det muligt at download et antal relaterede filer på én gang. Formatet BØR udtrykkes med en medietype defineret af Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) (https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The package format of the distribution in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together.
Format til pakning af data med henblik på distribution af en eller flere relaterede datafiler der samles til en enhed med henblik på samlet distribution

rdf:Description.sh:name: documentation
dokumentation
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a page or document about this Distribution.
Denne egenskab angiver en webside eller et dokument som beskriver distibutionen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A page or document about this thing.
En side eller et dokument vedrørende denne entitet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: has policy
har politik
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the policy expressing the rights associated with the distribution if using the ODRL vocabulary
Denne egenskab angiver de rettigheder der er forbundet med distributionen hvis W3Cs Open Digital Rights Language (ODRL) anvendes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies an ODRL Policy for which the identified Asset is the target Asset to all the Rules.
Identificerer en ODRL Politik hvis regler gælder det identificerede aktiv.

rdf:Description.sh:name: license
licens
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the licence under which the Distribution is made available.
Denne egenskab angiver den licens distributionen er gjort tilgængelig under.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.
Et juridisk dokument der fastlægger de officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: rights
rettigheder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Distribution.
Denne egenskab giver reference til et dokument der beskriver rettighederne forbundet med distributionen
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
Information om rettigheder forbundet med ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: temporal resolution
tidslig opløsning
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset distribution.
Denne egenskab angiver mindste tidsperiode der kan resolveres i distributionen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: minimum time period resolvable in a dataset.
mindste tidsperiode der kan resolveres i datasættet.

rdf:Description.sh:name: spatial resolution
geografisk opløsning (i meter)
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset distribution, measured in meters.
Denne egenskab angiver mindste geografiske afstand som kan resolveres i en distribution, målt i meter.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in metres.
mindste geografiske afstand som kan erkendes i et datasæt, målt i meter.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Data Service
Datatjeneste
rdf:Description.sh:description: A collection of operations that provides access to one or more datasets or data processing functions.
Et websted eller endpoint der udstiller operationer relateret til opdagelse af, adgang til eller behandlende funktioner på data eller relaterede ressourcer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A site or end-point providing operations related to the discovery of, access to, or processing functions on, data or related resources.
Et websted eller endpoint der udstiller operationer relateret til opdagelse af, adgang til eller behandlende funktioner på data eller relaterede ressourcer.

rdf:Description.sh:name: endpoint URL
endpoint-URL
rdf:Description.sh:description: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (an IRI).
Denne egenskab giver rodplaceringen eller det primære endpoint for en tjeneste (en web-resolverbar IRI).
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (a web-resolvable IRI).
Rodplaceringen eller det primære endpoint for en tjeneste (en web-resolverbar IRI).

rdf:Description.sh:name: title
titel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name given to the Data Service. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.
Denne egenskab angiver det eller de ord som navngiver datatjenesten. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af titlen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.
Et navn givet til ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: endpoint description
endpointbeskrivelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a description of the services available via the end-points, including their operations, parameters etc. The property gives specific details of the actual endpoint instances, while dct:conformsTo is used to indicate the general standard or specification that the endpoints implement.

Denne egenskab giver en beskrivelse af det pågældende tjenesteendpoint, inklusiv dets operationer, parametre etc. Egenskaben udtrykker specifikke oplysninger om de faktiske endpointinstanser, hvorimod dct:conformsTo anvendes til at angive en generel standard eller specifikation som det aktuelle endpoint er i overensstemmelse med.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A description of the service end-point, including its operations, parameters etc.
En beskrivelse af det pågældende tjenesteendpoint, inklusiv dets operationer, parametre etc.

rdf:Description.sh:name: description
beskrivelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a free-text account of the Data Service. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
Denne egenskab giver en tekstbaseret beskrivelse af datatjenesten
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An account of the resource.
En forklaring af ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: serves dataset
datatjeneste for datasæt
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a collection of data that this data service can distribute
Denne egenskab refererer til en samling af data som denne datatjeneste kan distribuere.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of data that this DataService can distribute.
En samling af data som denne datatjeneste kan distribuere.

rdf:Description.sh:name: licence
licens
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the licence under which the Data service is made available.
Denne egenskab angiver den licens datatjenesten er gjort tilgængelig under.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.
Et juridisk dokument der fastlægger de officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: access rights
adgangsrettigheder
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property MAY include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.
Denne egenskab giver reference til et dokument der beskriver adgangsrettighederne forbundet med datatjenesten
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
Information om rettigheder forbundet med ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Agent
Aktør
rdf:Description.sh:description: An entity that is associated with Catalogues and/or Datasets. If the Agent is an organisation, the use of the Organization Ontology is recommended.

En entitet som er tilknyttet kataloget, datasættet eller datatjenesten. Hvis aktøren er en organisation, så anbefales det at denne opmærkes med W3Cs The Organization Ontology (https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-org/)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).
En aktør (fx. person, gruppe, software eller fysisk artefakt).

rdf:Description.sh:name: name
navn
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name of the agent. This property can be repeated for different versions of the name (e.g. the name in different languages)
Denne egenskab angiver aktørens navn. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af navnet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name for some thing.
Et navn for noget

rdf:Description.sh:name: type
aktørtype
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a type of the agent that makes the Catalogue or Dataset available
Denne egenskab angiver aktørens type i forhold til dennes iboende karakter. Til angivelse af aktørtype skal følgende klassifikation anvendes: ADMS Publisher Type, http://purl.org/adms/publishertype/
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nature or genre of the resource.
Type set i forhold til ressourcens genre eller iboende karakter.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Organisation
Organisation
rdf:Description.sh:description: collection of people organized together into a community or other social, commercial or political structure
samling mennesker, der er organiseret i et fællesskab eller anden social, kommerciel eller politisk struktur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Represents a collection of people organized together into a community or other social, commercial or political structure. The group has some common purpose or reason for existence which goes beyond the set of people belonging to it and can act as an Agent. Organizations are often decomposable into hierarchical structures. It is recommended that SKOS lexical labels should be used to label the Organization. In particular `skos:prefLabel` for the primary (possibly legally recognized name), `skos:altLabel` for alternative names (trading names, colloquial names) and `skos:notation` to denote a code from a code list. Alternative names: _Collective_ _Body_ _Org_ _Group_
Repræsenterer en samling mennesker, der er organiseret i et fællesskab eller anden social, kommerciel eller politisk struktur.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Category Scheme
Begrebssystem
rdf:Description.sh:description: A concept collection (e.g. controlled vocabulary) in which the Category is defined.
En samling af begreber (fx. et kontrolleret udfaldsrum) hvori et givet begreb indgår.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A set of concepts, optionally including statements about semantic relationships between those concepts.
En samling af ét eller flere begreber, samt eventuelt også udsagn om de indbyrdes semantiske relationer mellem disse begreber.

rdf:Description.sh:name: title
titel
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a name of the category scheme. May be repeated for different versions of the name
Denne egenskab angiver det eller de ord som navngiver emneklassifikationen. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af titlen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A name given to the resource.
Et navn givet til ressourcen.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Category
Begreb
rdf:Description.sh:description: A subject of a Dataset.
En emne som klassificerer datasættet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An idea or notion; a unit of thought.
En idé eller en forestilling; en tankeenhed

rdf:Description.sh:name: preferred label
foretrukken betegnelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a preferred label of the category. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the label.
Denne egenskab angiver begrebets foretrukne betegnelse. Egenskaben kan optræde én gang for hver sprogvariant af betegnelsen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The preferred lexical label for a resource, in a given language.
Det foretrukne leksikalske udtryk for en ressource på et givet sprog.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Checksum
Checksum
rdf:Description.sh:description: A Checksum is value that allows the contents of a file to be authenticated. Even small changes to the content of the file will change its checksum. This class allows the results of a variety of checksum and cryptographic message digest algorithms to be represented.

En checksum en en værdi som gør det muligt at verificere indholdet af en fil. Selv mindre ændringer i indholdet af en fil vil ændre dets checksum. Denne klasse gør det muligt at repræsentere resultaterne af forskellige checksum- og kryptografiske Message-Digest-algoritmer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Checksum is value that allows the contents of a file to be authenticated. Even small changes to the content of the file will change its checksum. This class allows the results of a variety of checksum and cryptographic message digest algorithms to be represented

En checksum en en værdi som gør det muligt at verificere indholdet af en fil. Selv mindre ændringer i indholdet af en fil vil ændre dets checksum. Denne klasse gør det muligt at repræsentere resultaterne af forskellige checksum- og kryptografiske Message-Digest-algoritmer.

rdf:Description.sh:name: algorithm
algoritme
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property identifies the algorithm used to produce the subject Checksum. Currently, SHA-1 is the only supported algorithm. It is anticipated that other algorithms will be supported at a later time.

Denne egenskab angiver den algoritme der er blevet anvendt til at beregne checksum-værdien. Iøjeblikket understøttes alene SHA-1-algoritment. Der forventes at yderligere algoritmer vil blive understøttet på et senere tidspunkt.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies the algorithm used to produce the subject Checksum. Currently, SHA-1 is the only supported algorithm. It is anticipated that other algorithms will be supported at a later time.

Angiver den algoritme der er blevet anvendt til at beregne checksum-værdien. Iøjeblikket understøttes alene SHA-1-algoritment. Der forventes at yderligere algoritmer vil blive understøttet på et senere tidspunkt.

rdf:Description.sh:name: checksum value
checksumværdi
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property provides a lower case hexadecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm
Denne egenskab angiver en digest-værdi beregnet med en specifik algoritme og udtrykt osm en lower case hexidecimal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The checksumValue property provides a lower case hexidecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Identifier
Identifikator
rdf:Description.sh:description: An identifier in a particular context, consisting of the string that is the identifier; an optional identifier for the identifier scheme; an optional identifier for the version of the identifier scheme; an optional identifier for the agency that manages the identifier scheme

En identifikator i en bestemt kontekst bestående af en streng der udgør selve idenfikatoren; en valgfri identifikator af identifikatorschemaet; en valgfri identifikator for versionen af identifikatorschemaet; en valgfri identifikator at den autoritet der administrerer identifikatorschemaet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This class is based on the UN/CEFACT Identifier complex type defined in See Section 5.8 of Core Components Data Type Catalogue Version 3.1 (http://www.unece.org/fileadmin/DAM/cefact/codesfortrade/CCTS/CCTS-DTCatalogueVersion3p1.pdf) In RDF this is expressed using the following properties: - the content string should be provided using skos:notation, datatyped with the identifier scheme (inclduing the version number if appropriate); - use dcterms:creator to link to a class describing the agency that manages the identifier scheme or adms:schemaAgency to provide the name as a literal. Although not part of the ADMS conceptual model, it may be useful to provide further properties to the Identifier class such as dcterms:created to provide the date on which the identifier was issued.
Denne klasse er baseret på UN/CEFACT Identifier.

rdf:Description.sh:name: notation
notation
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains a string that is an identifier in the context of the identifier scheme referenced by its datatype.
Denne engenskab indeholder en streng som fungerer som en identifikator i kontekst af det identifikatorschema datatypen refererer til.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A notation, also known as classification code, is a string of characters such as "T58.5" or "303.4833" used to uniquely identify a concept within the scope of a given concept scheme.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Licence Document
Licensdokument
rdf:Description.sh:description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.
Et juridisk dokument der fastlægger de officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.
Et juridisk dokument der fastlægger de officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: licence type
licenstype
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to a type of licence, e.g. indicating ‘public domain’ or ‘royalties required’.
Denne egenskab angiver licensens type som defineret af ADMS licence type vocabulary (http://purl.org/adms/licencetype/)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The nature or genre of the resource.
Type set i forhold til ressourcens genre eller iboende karakter.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Location
Lokation
rdf:Description.sh:description: A spatial region or named place. It can be represented using a controlled vocabulary or with geographic coordinates. In the latter case, the use of the Core Location Vocabulary is recommended, following the approach described in the GeoDCAT-AP specification.

Et geografisk område eller navngivet sted. Det kan repræsenteres ved en kontrollereret udfaldsrum eller geografiske koordinater. Til sidstnævnte, anbefales det at vokabularet Core Location anvendes iht. den metode der beskrives i GeoDCAT-AP-specifikationen.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A spatial region or named place.
Et geografisk område eller navngivet sted.

rdf:Description.sh:name: bounding box
bounding box
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to he geographic bounding box of a resource.
Denne egenskab angiver den geografiske omskrevne firkant af en ressource. Koordinater i den omskrevne firkant skal være angivet i geografiske koordinater.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The geographic bounding box of a resource.
Den geografiske omskrevne firkant af en ressource

rdf:Description.sh:name: centroid
geometrisk tyngdepunkt
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the geographic center (centroid) of a resource.
Denne egenskab angiver en ressource geometriske tyngdepunkt (centroid).
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The geographic center (centroid) of a resource.
Det geometriske tyngdepunkt (centroid) for en ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: geometry
geometri
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property associates any resource with the corresponding geometry.
Denne egenskab knytter en ressource til dens tilsvarende geometri.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates any resource with the corresponding geometry.
Knytter en ressource til dens tilsvarende geometri.

rdf:Description.sh:name: PeriodOfTime
Periode
rdf:Description.sh:description: An interval of time that is named or defined by its start and end dates.
Et tidsinterval der er navngivet eller fastlagt ved start- og slutdato.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An interval of time that is named or defined by its start and end dates.
Et tidsinterval der er navngivet eller fastlagt ved start- og slutdato.

rdf:Description.sh:name: start date
startdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the start of the period
Denne egenskab angiver periodens startdato.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The start of the period.
Start på perioden.

rdf:Description.sh:name: end date
slutdato
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the end of the period.
Denne egenskab angiver slutningen på perioden.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The end of the period.
Slutningen på perioden.

rdf:Description.sh:name: beginning
har begyndelse
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the beginning of a period or interval.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Denne egenskab angiver begyndelsen på en periode eller tidsinterval.
Beginning of a temporal entity.
Begyndelsen på en periode eller tidsinterval.

rdf:Description.sh:name: end
har slutning
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property contains the end of a period or interval
Denne egenskab angiver slutningen på en periode eller tidsinterval.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: End of a temporal entity.
Slutningen på en periode eller tidsinterval.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Relationship
Relation
rdf:Description.sh:description: An association class for attaching additional information to a relationship between DCAT Resources
En associationsklasse hvormed en relation mellem to DCAT-ressourcer kan forsynes med yderligere information.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An association class for attaching additional information to a relationship between DCAT Resources.
En associationsklasse hvormed en relation mellem two DCAT-ressourcer kan forsynes med yderligere information.

rdf:Description.sh:name: relation
relation
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the resource related to the source resource.
Denne egenskab angiver en ressource som er relateret til den aktuelle ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A related resource.
En relateret ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: had role
havde rolle
rdf:Description.sh:description: This property refers to the function of an entity or agent with respect to another entity or resource.
Denne egenskab angiver den rolle som en entitet eller aktør spiller i forhold til en anden entitet eller ressource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The function of an entity or agent with respect to another entity or resource.
Den funktion en entitet eller aktør har i forhold til en anden ressource.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Activity
Activitet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

En aktivitet er noget der sker over en tidsperiode og påvirker eller interagerer med entiteter; dette kan inkludere forbrug, behandling, transformation, ændring, omplacering, anvendelse eller skabelse af entiteter.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Frequency
Frekvens
rdf:Description.sh:description: A rate at which something recurs, e.g. the publication of a Dataset.
Den hyppighed med hvilken noget gentages, fx. opdateringen af et datasæt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A rate at which something recurs.
Hyppighed med hvilken noget gentages.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Linguistic system
Lingvistisk system
rdf:Description.sh:description: A system of signs, symbols, sounds, gestures, or rules used in communication, e.g. a language
Et system bestående af tegn, symboler, lyde, gestikulation eller regler anvendt i kommunikation, fx. et sprog.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A system of signs, symbols, sounds, gestures, or rules used in communication.
Et system bestående af tegn, symboler, lyde, gestikulation eller regler anvendt i kommunikation.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Media Type
Medietype
rdf:Description.sh:description: A media type, e.g. the format of a computer file
Formatet for lagringen af indhold i en computerfil.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A file format or physical medium.
Et filformat eller fysisk medie.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Role
Rolle
rdf:Description.sh:description: A role is the function of a resource or agent with respect to another resource, in the context of resource attribution or resource relationships. Note it is a subclass of skos:Concept.
En rolle er den funktion en ressource eller aktør har i forhold til en anden ressource, i forbindelse med ressourcekreditering eller ressourcerelationer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A role is the function of a resource or agent with respect to another resource, in the context of resource attribution or resource relationships.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Provenance Statement
Proveniensudsagn
rdf:Description.sh:description: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of a resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation
Denne egenskab angiver udsagn omkring datasættets oprindelse og udvikling. Proveniensudsagn erstatter ikke direkte brug af udsagn om ejerskab og varetagelse af datasættet, men er et supplement.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any changes in ownership and custody of a resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.
Enhver ændring i en ressources ejerskabs- eller kustodeforhold siden ressourcen blev skabt som er centrale for autencitet, integritet og fortolkning.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Rights Statement
Rettighedsudsagn
rdf:Description.sh:description: A statement about the intellectual property rights (IPR) held in or over a resource, a legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource, or a statement about access rights.

En beskrivelse af de intellektuelle ejendomsrettigheder forbundet med en ressource, et juridisk dokument der angiver officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource eller en beskrivelse af adgangsrettigheder.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A statement about the intellectual property rights (IPR) held in or over a resource, a legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource, or a statement about access rights.
Udsagn om de intellektuelle ejendomsrettigheder forbundet med en ressource, et juridisk dokument der angiver officielle tilladelser vedrørende en ressource eller en beskrivelse af adgangsrettigheder.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Document
Dokument
rdf:Description.sh:description: A textual resource intended for human consumption that contains information, e.g. a web page about a Dataset.
En tekstbaseret ressourcer som indeholder information målrettet mennesker, fx. en webside som beskriver et datasæt
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A document.
Et dokument.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Standard
Specifikation
rdf:Description.sh:description: A standard or other specification to which a Dataset or Distribution conforms
En standard eller anden specifikation som et katalog, et datasæt, en datatjeneste eller en distribution overholder.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference point against which other things can be evaluated or compared.
Et referencepunkt som man kan evaluere eller sammenligne andre ressourcer op i mod.

rdf:Description.sh:name: Kind
Virtuelt visitkort
rdf:Description.sh:description: A description following the vCard specification, e.g. to provide telephone number and e-mail address for a contact point. Note that the class Kind is the parent class for the four explicit types of vCards (Individual, Organization, Location, Group)

Et virtuelt visitkort som overholder vCard-specifikationen. Anvendes eksempelvis til angivelse af telefonnummer og emailadrese for et kontaktpunkt. Bemærk at denne klasse er overklassen for de fire eksplicitte vCard-typer (Individ, Organisation, Lokation og Gruppe)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The parent class for all objects
Moderklassen for alle objekter

rdf:Description.sh:name: Usage
Anvendelse DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: A helpful description of actions that can be performed on a given dataset or distribution
En beskrivelse af de handlinger der kan udføres med et datasæt eller dets distribution (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A helpful description of actions that can be performed on a given dataset or distribution
En beskrivelse af de handlinger der kan udføres med et datasæt eller dets distribution

rdf:Description.sh:name: Quality Metadata
Kvalitetsmetadata DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: Represents quality metadata
Repræsenterer kvalitetsmetadata (dansk tilføjelse)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Repræsenterer kvalitetsmetadata, og er defineret for at gruppere kvalitetscertifikater, -politikker, -målinger pg annotationer under er navngiven graf
Represents quality metadata, it is defined to group quality certificates, policies, measurements and annotations under a named graph

rdf:Description.sh:name: Personal Data Category
Personoplysningskategori DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: Data kan opmærkes med en Personoplysningskategori som beskrives i Datatilsynets vejledning: almindelige personoplysninger, følsomme personoplysninger eller oplysninger om strafbare forhold. Dertil tilføjes en angivelse af fraværet af personoplysninger.

Data can be marked with a category of personal data as it is described in the Danish Data Protection Agency’s guideline: general personal data, sensitive personal data or data about criminal offences. To that is added information regarding the absence of personal data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: kategori af personoplysninger set i forhold til følsomhed idet der gælder forskellige betingelser og procedurer for behandling af oplysningerne
classification according to the sensitivity of information as defifferent conditions and procedures for processing are applicable

rdf:Description.sh:name: Confidentiality Type
Fortrolighedsgrad DK
rdf:Description.sh:description: Anvendes som overklasse for klassen ConfidentialityTypeNatoEu der indeholder klassifikationer anvendt i henholdsvis NATO og EU
Used as a super class for the class ConfidentialityTypeNatoEu that contains classification used in NATO and EU respectively
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: grad af fortrolighed forstået som i hvilket omfang information kan videregives
degree of confidentiality with respect to the extent by which information can be disclosed

rdf:Description.sh:name: Catalogued resource
Katalogiseret ressource
rdf:Description.sh:description: A Catalog, Dataset and DataService
Et katalog, et dataset eller en datatjeneste
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: the union of Catalog, Dataset and DataService
Resource published or curated by a single agent.
Ressource udgivet eller udvalgt og arrangeret af en enkelt aktør.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcat:Resource
rdf:Description.sh:message: The node is either a Catalog, Dataset or a DataService

rdf:Description.sh:name: DateOrDateTimeDataType
Tidsdatatype
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Date time date disjunction shape checks that a datatype property receives a date or a dateTime literal
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Date time date disjunction
rdf:Description.sh:message: The values must be data typed as either xsd:date or xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Obligatorisk
Mandatory
rdf:Description.dct:description: a receiver MUST be able to process the information for that property; a sender MUST provide the information for that property.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Anbefalet
Recommended
rdf:Description.dct:description: a receiver MUST be able to process the information for that property; a sender SHOULD provide the information for that property if it is available.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Valgfri
Optional
rdf:Description.dct:description: a receiver MUST be able to process the information for that property; a sender MAY provide the information for that property but is not obliged to do so.
